attributes.action: launch a thorough and complete police investigation of possible offences of fraud and theft committed by MP's by abuse of the expenses system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that a number of MP's may have commited offences under the 2006 Fraud Act and the 1968 Theft Act.

How can we as a society expect our citizens to be honest and law abiding when faced with such blatant dishonesty from our leaders.

This should be investigated and prosecuted to the full extent of the law just as it would be for any other citizen.

rejection.details: The Government can not launch a police investigation.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
